short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get to know your team or friends with this simple tab extension. Over 100 fun, safe for work questions. Perfect for team meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start a new tab to get a lighthearted, safe-for-work question to ask your group. Perfect for team meetings, icebreakers, or even a dinner party. New questions continuously added.
